vocabulary.definition: a person who is skilled at sports
vocabulary.example: The athlete trained every day to become stronger

vocabulary.definition: to try to win against other people
vocabulary.example: Many teams compete in the soccer tournament

vocabulary.definition: winning a game or contest
vocabulary.example: The team celebrated their victory with cheers

vocabulary.definition: a person who teaches and trains athletes
vocabulary.example: The coach helped the players improve their skills

vocabulary.definition: a large building where sports are played
vocabulary.example: Thousands of fans filled the football stadium

vocabulary.definition: the special tools and gear needed for a sport
vocabulary.example: Hockey players need protective equipment

vocabulary.definition: doing something over and over to get better
vocabulary.example: She practices piano for one hour every day

vocabulary.definition: the person or team you compete against
vocabulary.example: The tennis player shook hands with her opponent

vocabulary.definition: a contest where many teams or players compete
vocabulary.example: The basketball tournament lasted three days

vocabulary.definition: the most important contest to decide the best team
vocabulary.example: They won the championship after a tough game

vocabulary.definition: working together with others to reach a goal
vocabulary.example: Good teamwork helped them win the relay race

vocabulary.definition: a plan for how to win or succeed
vocabulary.example: The coach shared a new strategy for the next game

vocabulary.definition: the ability to keep going for a long time
vocabulary.example: Marathon runners need great endurance

vocabulary.definition: being fair and respectful in sports
vocabulary.example: Good sportsmanship means congratulating the other team

vocabulary.definition: refusing to give up even when things are hard
vocabulary.example: Her determination helped her finish the difficult race

vocabulary.definition: the ability to move your body parts together smoothly
vocabulary.example: Gymnasts need excellent coordination for their routines

vocabulary.definition: being able to move quickly and easily
vocabulary.example: The soccer player's agility helped him dodge defenders

vocabulary.definition: someone who gets paid to play sports as their job
vocabulary.example: She became a professional tennis player

vocabulary.definition: continuing to try even when facing difficulties
vocabulary.example: His perseverance paid off when he made the team

vocabulary.definition: having a strong desire to win
vocabulary.example: The competitive swimmer trained twice a day
